data.name: 0000 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: After that, we came to a vacant lot to sort out our location.

data.name: 0001 (425.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Wow, you can smell the grass. It seems like it'd be fun to do a barbeque here.

data.name: 0002 (425.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's our Koizumi. I'm impressed you got us permission for a place like this.

data.name: 0004 (425.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Of course. Thankfully the owner was very understanding.

data.name: 0005 (425.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: They gave us permission without hesitation.

data.name: 0006 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Well, it'd hardly surprise me if the owner turns out to be from the "Agency" themselves.

data.name: 0008 (425.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: So, Kyon's on shopping--the rest of us are going back to school to get equipment.

data.name: 0009 (425.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Huh? Do we really need to go back so soon? We've come all this way and stuff, so…

data.name: 0010 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: By this point, unnatural phenomena could be showing up at school at any moment.

data.name: 0011 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's only natural that Asahina--having just encountered one--wouldn't want to go back.

data.name: 0014 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Nagato said nothing in response. Well, I guess she did say she didn't see anything earlier.

data.name: 0015 (425.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Our precious time is ticking away by the second, you know?

data.name: 0017 (425.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Indeed. My greatest apologies that you had to come all the way out here.

data.name: 0018 (425.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It is only because Miss Suzumiya wanted to confirm this location, however.

data.name: 0019 (425.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It's fine. It's only natural that I--the brigade chief--get to decide.

data.name: 0020 (425.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Alright. If we want to be able to take it easy later, we'd better get everything ready!

data.name: 0022 (425.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Eeeeeh...

data.name: 0023 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If we can, I'd really like to get Haruhi as far away from the school as possible, but...

data.name: 0024 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ...since Haruhi is insisting on getting the equipment herself...

data.name: 0025 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ...I at least need Nagato, Koizumi and Asahina to go with her...

data.name: 0026 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ...just in case something unexpected happens.

data.name: 0027 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: That way, I'm certain they'll make sure Haruhi doesn't see anything out of the ordinary.

data.name: 0028 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Though, maybe I shouldn't have forced Asahina to go straight back to the school?

data.name: 0029 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Seeing Asahina getting dragged around by Haruhi...

data.name: 0030 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I can't help feeling I made the wrong choice and praying for Asahina's safety

data.name: 0033 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Having chosen to go shopping, I arrived at the shopping district alone.

data.name: 0034 (425.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Kyon... buy me ice cream~

data.name: 0035 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Hold on a second--I was supposed to be shopping alone...

data.name: 0036 (425.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Give me ice cream as a reward for coming with you~

data.name: 0037 (425.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I don't remember asking you to come with me.

data.name: 0038 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I chose to go alone since it'd be more rational and smooth.

data.name: 0039 (425.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: But you were the only one going to the shops...

data.name: 0040 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: So your plan was to extort me all along, huh. As your brother, I'm worried about your future.

data.name: 0041 (425.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: If I've got any money left after I've bought everything.

data.name: 0042 (425.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Ehh... Even though it's this hot...?

data.name: 0043 (425.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: And once you've finished shopping my hands will be taken from carrying everything...

data.name: 0044 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Looks like she was at least willing to carry stuff for me.

data.name: 0045 (425.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Yeah--Haru-nyan said if you don't work, you don't eat.

data.name: 0046 (425.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Are you sure you understand what that means?

data.name: 0047 (425.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: It means if I help out, you'll buy me ice cream...

data.name: 0048 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I won't say she's wrong, but Haruhi's definitely having a big influence on her.

data.name: 0049 (425.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …Look, I'll buy you an ice cream so stop imitating Haruhi.

data.name: 0050 (425.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Yay, ice cream~

data.name: 0051 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: With the shopping list Haruhi wrote in one hand, we started shopping.

data.name: 0052 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Meat----Beef is expensive, so chicken and pork will do. Ask for lots of freebies.

data.name: 0053 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ...You can say "it's brigade chief orders!" as much as you want, but...

data.name: 0054 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It would be a breeze if I had someone like Asahina with me...

data.name: 0055 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: For someone like me, who's not used to shopping, there's no way.

data.name: 0056 (425.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Kyon, I want ice cream...

data.name: 0057 (425.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Right, she's here. Alright little sister, time to help me shop.

data.name: 0058 (425.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Okayyy.

data.name: 0059 (425.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Alright, when we go to buy this, ask for a lots of freebies.

data.name: 0060 (425.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Is that it?

data.name: 0061 (425.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Yep.

data.name: 0062 (425.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Okay, got it. Give me lots of freebies, please!

data.name: 0063 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The "you can't win against animals or children" strategy is underway.

data.name: 0064 (425.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Give me lots of freebies, please!

data.name: 0065 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: My sister, ice cream in hand, pestering for freebies was rather well received. Nice move.

data.name: 0066 (425.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Give me lots of freebies, please!

data.name: 0067 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'm gonna ignore the subtle glances the shopkeepers are giving me on this occasion.

data.name: 0068 (425.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Give me lots of freebies, please!

data.name: 0069 (425.ja) GROCER (八百屋)
data.value: Sure, sure. I'll give you freebies. Though, that's a lot of shopping.

data.name: 0070 (425.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: We're having a barbeque.

data.name: 0071 (425.ja) GROCER (八百屋)
data.value: Ohh, do you have a big family? Or are you having a party?

data.name: 0072 (425.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Summer camp.

data.name: 0073 (425.ja) GROCER (八百屋)
data.value: You mean you're having a summer camp at school?

data.name: 0074 (425.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Yes, well, more or less. We've decided to have a barbeque.

data.name: 0075 (425.ja) GROCER (八百屋)
data.value: At North High? Then, what about this girl?

data.name: 0076 (425.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: My little sister--She insisted on coming.

data.name: 0077 (425.ja) GROCER (八百屋)
data.value: My, how admirable. You two are close, huh~

data.name: 0078 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Is that how people see it? Well, not that we have a bad relationship or anything.

data.name: 0079 (425.ja) GROCER (八百屋)
data.value: Helping your your big brother, hey? That's very admirable.

data.name: 0080 (425.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Give me lots of freebies, please!

data.name: 0081 (425.ja) GROCER (八百屋)
data.value: Really getting into your club activities, hey? You must need lots of nutrition for sports.

data.name: 0082 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Looks like they think we're doing a sports club.

data.name: 0083 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Well, if it gets us freebies it doesn't bother me.

data.name: 0084 (425.ja) GROCER (八百屋)
data.value: Here, take this. It's very nutritious~

data.name: 0085 (425.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Yay, thank you--!

data.name: 0086 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Well, we've already got it so I'd better play my part in getting the story straight.

data.name: 0087 (425.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: It's so hot, so getting energy is really important. Thanks a lot.

data.name: 0088 (425.ja) GROCER (八百屋)
data.value: Well, you can only be reckless when you're young. Take this as well.

data.name: 0089 (425.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Yay, thanks a lot--!

data.name: 0090 (425.ja) GROCER (八百屋)
data.value: Oh, right. You might as well take this as well.

data.name: 0091 (425.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Is this a music CD?

data.name: 0092 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The CD seems to be some kind of video game BGM collection.

data.name: 0093 (425.ja) GROCER (八百屋)
data.value: I got from a game's giveaway, but no one at home listens to it.

data.name: 0094 (425.ja) GROCER (八百屋)
data.value: With some music, your practice would be a little more fun, right? Give it a go.

data.name: 0095 (425.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Yes, thank you very much.

data.name: 0097 (425.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: We're not a sports club... we're from the literature club.

data.name: 0098 (425.ja) GROCER (八百屋)
data.value: If you're from the literature club, don't you read and write books?

data.name: 0099 (425.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Ahh, well, that kind of thing...

data.name: 0100 (425.ja) GROCER (八百屋)
data.value: What're you doing at school in your summer camp?

data.name: 0101 (425.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Searching for scary stories.

data.name: 0102 (425.ja) GROCER (八百屋)
data.value: Ahh, writing ghost stories? I suppose that's very summery as well.

data.name: 0103 (425.ja) GROCER (八百屋)
data.value: That ridiculous stuff is fun while you're young after all. Give it your best.

data.name: 0104 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'd rather not be doing ridiculous stuff. I wanna go straight home.

data.name: 0105 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Unable to be that honest out loud, I accepted the encouragement with a bitter smile.

data.name: 0108 (425.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Umm, if we're not missing anything... then that should be all the shopping done.

data.name: 0109 (425.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Kyon, let's buy sweets!

data.name: 0110 (425.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You don't need sweets for a barbeque...

data.name: 0111 (425.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Ehh, you do! If you're eating outside you need a snack!

data.name: 0112 (425.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You say that, but it's not like we're on a trip. We just got bananas for free anyway.

data.name: 0113 (425.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: We definitely sweets! After-meal snacks~ Bananas don't count as snacks...

data.name: 0114 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Don't treat this summer camp like a trip or cherry blossom viewing.

data.name: 0115 (425.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: いらないだろ……ん、いや待てよ

data.name: 0116 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: バーベキューを楽しんで、遠足や 花見と同じにしてしまえばいい

data.name: 0117 (425.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: 花はないから、月見の宴会ってこと で腹がいっぱいになってしまえば

data.name: 0118 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 学校に戻って七不思議を調査する 気を無くしてくれるやもしれん

data.name: 0119 (425.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: でかした、妹よ。菓子を買ってやる

data.name: 0120 (425.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: わ～い、キョンくんにほめられたー

data.name: 0121 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 俺は妹と、菓子や目についたものを 買い足していくことにした

data.name: 0123 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: そして、ふと気づくと妹の姿が見え なくなっていた

data.name: 0124 (425.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: 猫ちゃん、おいで～、猫ちゃん

data.name: 0125 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 声はすれども姿は見えず。やるな 妹よ。どんな技を身につけたんだ

data.name: 0126 (425.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: 猫ちゃん～、おいでおいで～

data.name: 0127 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 妹は技を身につけたわけではなく ただ地面にしゃがんでいただけだ

data.name: 0128 (425.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: なんだ。ここにいたのか

data.name: 0129 (425.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: キョンくん、猫がいるんだよー

data.name: 0130 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 猫ぐらいどこにでもいるだろ

data.name: 0131 (425.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: 飼い猫じゃないのかもー。お腹 すいてるみたいだよ、キョンくん

data.name: 0132 (425.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: そういや魚肉ソーセージを買った っけな。それでもやっておけ

data.name: 0133 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 妹がなぜかオヤツとして買った ものだ。安いしいいだろう

data.name: 0134 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 放っておくと、メインディッシュの 肉をやりかねんしな

data.name: 0135 (425.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: はーい。猫ちゃんゴハンあげるよ

data.name: 0136 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ビニールを器用に剥いて、猫に 差し出す

data.name: 0137 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 匂いにつられたのか、猫は隠れて いた場所から出てエサを食べ始めた

data.name: 0138 (425.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: よしよし～、おいしかった？ 猫ちゃんー

data.name: 0139 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 猫はゴロゴロと喉を鳴らして、妹に 懐いている

data.name: 0140 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 食い物で豹変するとはげんきんな 猫である

data.name: 0141 (425.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: もういいだろ、帰るぞ

data.name: 0142 (425.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: うんっ、ばーべきゅーだーっ あたしもお腹すいちゃったー

data.name: 0143 (425.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: おまえも魚肉ソーセージでも 食っておけ

data.name: 0144 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 肉の分け前は少ないからな 少ない肉の争奪は否めないだろう

data.name: 0145 (425.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: あれ、猫ちゃんがついてくるよ

data.name: 0146 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 俺たちの後をさっきの猫がついて 来ている

data.name: 0147 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: エサをやったせいか？ もうやらんぞ

data.name: 0148 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: しまったな。放っておいた方が 良かったのかもしれん

data.name: 0149 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 追い払っても、猫は悠々と俺たちの 前後を走り、ついてきてしまった

data.name: 0150 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: いいカモだと猫になめられたか？

data.name: 0151 (425.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: ほっとけ。飼い猫なら家に帰るし ノラなら自力でエサを捕るべきだ

data.name: 0152 (425.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: 安い同情は猫のためにならん

data.name: 0153 (425.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: 安い同情ってなにー？

data.name: 0154 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 生きるということは苛酷なんだ 妹よ。人も猫もな

data.name: 0155 (425.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: 無責任にエサをやったらいけないと いうことだ

data.name: 0156 (425.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: いけないのー？

data.name: 0157 (425.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: いけないんだ

data.name: 0158 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 地域住民の迷惑になりかねないとか 猫の自立性の阻害だとか

data.name: 0159 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 妹にノラ猫問題を深く語っても意味 はないだろう

data.name: 0160 (425.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: おまえも見ず知らずの人に菓子を やると言われてもついていくなよ

data.name: 0161 (425.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: うん。学校でもそう言われてるよー

data.name: 0162 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 今のたとえで何となく納得して くれたらしい

data.name: 0163 (425.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 俺たちは買い出しを終えて、空き地 に戻るべく歩き出した

data.name: 0164 (425.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: 話を合わせる

data.name: 0165 (425.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: 文芸部だと正直に言う

data.name: 0166 (425.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: エサをあげる

data.name: 0167 (425.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: 放っておく
